column5: Interesting to see how some companies calculate their maximum payload capacity.  https://autos.yahoo.com/blogs/motoramic/fight-over-pickup-bragging-rights-reveals-detroit-s-fuzzy-payload-math-203152227.html
Who the hell needs spare tires,bumpers,jacks,consoles anyways....all the more reason to buy a Ram!!!
All Aluminum pick-ups are all part of this game now to.
